location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Mosque and Minaret of coloured tiles at Basra'. Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:189 x 140 mmCondition:The print is in good condition throughout.Foliation:‘25’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of a mosque and minaret in Basra. A colonnade at the right of the image leads towards the minaret left of centre, which is decorated with coloured tiles. Four figures stand at the base of the minaret while a palm grows in the courtyard in the foreground.Inscriptions:Pencil, longside image, to the right: '25'Ink, to the right of image: 'Mosque and Minaret of coloured tiles at Basra'
